SYS_INSERT_TIME = #{sysInsertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

ADMIN_STATE = #{adminState,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update auth_admin set SYS_INSERT_TIME = #{sysInsertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_UPDATE_TIME = #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ADMIN_NAME = #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADMIN_PWD = #{adminPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL1 = #{email1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL2 = #{email2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL3 = #{email3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL4 = #{email4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADMIN_ROLE = #{adminRole,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ADMIN_STATE = #{adminState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select:
SELECT FROM AUTH_ADMIN
ORDER BY SYS_INSERT_TIME DESC
SELECT COUNT(0) AS C FROM AUTH_ADMIN
